alert.note: Alert for Claiborne; Copiah; Jefferson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 18 at 8:35PM CST until January 18 at 9:30PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Claiborne County in southwestern Mississippi... Eastern Jefferson County in southwestern Mississippi... Western Copiah County in central Mississippi... * Until 930 PM CST. * At 835 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Red Lick, or 28 miles east of Natchez, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Union Church, Pleasant Hill, Peyton, Blue Hill, Allen, Barlow, Mcbride, Glancy and Dentville. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CST for central and southwestern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
